product_name: REI Tech Compatible All Season Gloves - Girls'
long_description: The girls' REI All Season Tech Compatible gloves let on-the-go kids use touch-screen phones and tablets while keeping their hands warm in frosty weather. Conductive material at the tips of the thumbs and index fingers lets them operate touch screens without having to remove their gloves. Hard-face fleece provides a snug fit, water repellency, wind resistance and breathability. Silicone pattern on the palms improves grip.
